title: Common
description: These properties are shared by all objects in the Mapeo database.

versionId.description: core discovery id (hex-encoded 32-byte buffer) and core index number, separated by '/'

schemaName.description: Name of Mapeo data type / schema

createdAt.description: RFC3339-formatted datetime of when the first version of the element was created

updatedAt.description: RFC3339-formatted datetime of when this version of the element was created

links.description: Version ids of the previous document versions this one is replacing. Each link is id (hex-encoded 32 byte buffer) and index number, separated by '/'
